      • getCommonTemplateVars

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getCommonTemplateVars(Request request)
        Returns:
        Map of template variables common to most or all views, such as variables that appear in a common header.

      • getPublicRootRef

        public static Reference getPublicRootRef(Request request)
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        A root reference usable in public, respecting the base_uri option in the application configuration.

      • getRepresentationDisposition

        public static Disposition getRepresentationDisposition(Identifier identifier,
                                                       Format outputFormat)
        Parameters:
        identifier -
        outputFormat -
        Returns:
        A content disposition based on the setting of CONTENT_DISPOSITION_CONFIG_KEY in the application configuration. If it is set to attachment, the disposition will have a filename set to a reasonable value based on the given identifier and output format.

      • doInit

        protected void doInit()
               throws ResourceException
        Throws:
        ResourceException

      • addNonEndpointOperations

        public void addNonEndpointOperations(OperationList opList,
                                     java.awt.Dimension fullSize)
        Most image-processing operations (crop, scale, etc.) are specified in a client request to an endpoint. This method adds any operations that endpoints have nothing to do with.
        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list to add the operations to.
        fullSize - Full size of the source image.

      • decodeSlashes

        protected final java.lang.String decodeSlashes(java.lang.String uriPathComponent)
        Some web servers have issues dealing with encoded slashes (%2F) in URLs. This method enables the use of an alternate string to represent a slash via SLASH_SUBSTITUTE_CONFIG_KEY.
        Parameters:
        uriPathComponent - Path component (a part of the path before, after, or between slashes)
        Returns:
        Path component with slashes decoded

      • decodeSlashes

        protected final Identifier decodeSlashes(Identifier identifier)
